pma:database.name: bughound
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `bug_report` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `programId` int(11) NOT NULL, `report_type` enum('Coding Error','Design Issue','Suggestion','Documentation','Hardware','Query') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Coding Error', `severity` enum('Minor','Serious','Fatal') NOT NULL, `problem_summary` text NOT NULL, `reproducible` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `problem` text NOT NULL, `suggested_fix` text NOT NULL, `reported_by_employeeId` int(11) NOT NULL, `reported_date` date NOT NULL, `attachmentId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `functional_areaId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `assigned_to_employeeId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `comments` text, `status` enum('Open','Closed','Resolved') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Open', `priority` text, `resolution` enum('Pending','Fixed','Irreproducible','Deferred','As designed','Withdrawn by Reporter','Need more info','Disagree with suggestion','Duplicate') DEFAULT NULL, `resolution_version` text, `resolved_by_employeeId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `resolved_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `tested_by_employeeId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tested_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `treat_as_deferred` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `programId` (`programId`), KEY `reported_by_employeeId` (`reported_by_employeeId`), KEY `attachmentId` (`attachmentId`), KEY `functional_areaId` (`functional_areaId`), KEY `assigned_to_employeeId` (`assigned_to_employeeId`), KEY `resolved_by_employeeId` (`resolved_by_employeeId`), KEY `tested_by_employeeId` (`tested_by_employeeId`), CONSTRAINT `bug_report_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`attachmentId`) REFERENCES `attachment` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `bug_report_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`functional_areaId`) REFERENCES `functional_area` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `bug_report_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`reported_by_employeeId`) REFERENCES `employee` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `bug_report_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`programId`) REFERENCES `program` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `employee` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` text NOT NULL, `user_name` text NOT NULL, `password` text NOT NULL, `user_level` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `program` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` text NOT NULL, `version_number` text NOT NULL, `release_number` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
